body:
How about also phrasing things from a "me"-perspective here? Same as with the other form fields in the user profile?

Maybe something along
> Programming Languages, Frameworks, Technologies, etc. I'm experienced with

and 
> Other Languages, Technologies, etc. I'm interested in

???

Plus, even though we treat these things like "tags" under the hood, for the user it's "just" a text input 😉 
So I would suggest to change the hint to a simple "separate with comma".
